item.description:
On Tuesday, January 12th we will be showing the documentary "What Would Jesus Buy?" It is a cynical and sarcastic look at the consumerism and materialism of America during the holiday seasons. It is a lighthearted movie with serious implications produced by Morgan Spurlock, the same person that did "Super Size Me!" Keep an eye on this site, our Facebook page or our website. In case of inclement weather, the meeting may be canceled.
<xobject width="320" height="265"><xembed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/sGi21YQFjMM&hl=en_US&fs=1&color1=0xe1600f&color2=0xfebd01" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="320" height="265" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></xembed></xobject>
Feel free to show up at the church around 6:30pm if you would like to socialize. The formal meeting will start at 7pm.
The meeting is free and open to the public. We always welcome donations. If you would like to join Greater Worcester Humanists, seek out Don Guyton at the next meeting. Dues are $30 per year and help us bring you entertaining and informative programs.
item.name: GWH MEETING - January 2010
